title: Online Presentation Design for Social Studies Experts Using Graphic Organizers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Theoretical Knowledge in Social Sciences and Professional Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environment using digital devices, providing content based on multimedia learning theory.

learning_goals: Learners can design presentations using graphic organizers to convey complex social concepts with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can differentiate types of graphic organizers (e.g., concept maps, mind maps) and explain ≥3 content-placement strategies per type.
Learners can achieve ≥4.0/5.0 in learning satisfaction using multimedia-based presentation materials aligned with multimedia learning theory.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
